body: So recently I joined an Avicus clan to play in the upcoming tourney. I have been seeing in chat people raging and forcing others to relog. Its causing spam in chat of  <Player> relog please. Or "YOUR INVISIBLE." What are your opinions? Is this a nuisance? Should players get punished for repeatly spamming in chat Relog? I got kicked for abusing glitches in which I can't help my self. So what are your opinions on this topic? Should player get punished for spamming consistantly after report the player for being invisible?

replies.body:
If you're spamming it, definitely, but if you just mention once "dude you need to relog, you're invisible" can actually stop the person from unintentionally abusing the invis glitch.

i saw a guy today break a monument while invisible, even after a couple ppl had explained to him what was happening and why he needed to relog, and imo abusing that glitch is worse than having people say to relog.
